author: Parvathi Menon
text:
Students, teachers, and activists drawn from academic centres in and outside London came together here to express their solidarity with students of the Jawaharlal Nehru University (JNU) and to demand the immediate and unconditional release of the three JNU students — Kanhaiya Kumar, Umar Khalid and Anirban Bhattacharya — who are currently under arrest.

“We are India's youth, we are not anti-national,” said Priyanka Basu, one of the organisers of the demonstration. — Parvathi Menon
title: Show of solidarity
